text: @OptoFortuna I am happy to hear this, Jeannie. I will be sure to notify her supervisors of the difference she made in handling this situation. If I can be of any further assistance, please feel free to DM us or follow up with me directly. Thank you. ^Ryan
@OptoFortuna You're welcome, Jeannie. We've received your DM and will be in touch shortly. ^lv

@_jweave23 Hello, We’re aware of an issue impacting online/mobile banking. We have teams working to investigate the issue and restore these services. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please contact 24-Hour Banking at 800-872-2657 with urgent account needs. Regards, ^Kim

@OptoFortuna Hello, Jeannie. We apologize you're having trouble with funding your account. We're happy to review this further and help in any way we can. Please DM your phone number and an Ambassador will call you directly. Thanks. ^lv
